com.jidesoft.swing
Interface ButtonStyle

All Known Implementing Classes:
CornerScroller, JideButton, JideSplitButton, JideToggleButton, JideToggleSplitButton, NullJideButton, SimpleScrollPane.ScrollButton
public interface ButtonStyle

The definitions of various button style. This is used by JideButton and JideSplitButton.
